import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; const DetailView = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('product-1'); const [watch, setWatch] = useState(null); const { id } = useParams(); console.log('id is'+id) const handleTabChange = (tabId) => { setActiveTab(tabId); }; useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/dashboard/watches/${id}/`) .then(response => { console.log(response.data) setWatch(response.data); console.log(watch) }) .catch(error => { console.log(error); }); }, [id]); return (

Watch {watch && watch.watch_name}

{/* Product Images */}
{/* Product Image Tabs */}
{/* Tab Navigation */}
{/* Tab Link 1 */} handleTabChange('product-1')} role="tab" aria-selected={activeTab === 'product-1'}> {/* Tab Link 2 */} handleTabChange('product-2')} role="tab" aria-selected={activeTab === 'product-2'}> handleTabChange('product-3')} role="tab" aria-selected={activeTab === 'product-2'}>
{/* Tab Content */}
{/* Inside the tab-content div */}
{/* Tab Pane 1 */}
{/* Tab Pane 2 */}
{/* Tab Pane 3 */}
{/* Buttons */}
{/* Product Details */}

); }; export default DetailView;
